title: Borobet - a humble pixel font
content:
This is my first try in making type. As it seemed easiest, I chose to make a pixelfont on a grid. I haven't drawn numerals yet, but I'm thinking it would be good to have old style figures as well. Being a large pixel font, I think it should be no problem.

What do you think?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317092444im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Borobet_6191.gif)
author: Boros

comments.content: It being a large pixel typeface, it is nice and readable, and has some nice serifs to it. Because of the density of lines at the bottom of the lowercase A, the lowercase A looks a different weight to the rest of the typeface.

At that size it would be beneficial to make the verticals two pixels thick.

hhp
